appsgate.lig.watteco.adapter
Class WattecoAdapter

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.watteco.adapter.WattecoAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WattecoDiscoveryService, WattecoIOService, WattecoTunSlipManagement
public class WattecoAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WattecoIOService, WattecoDiscoveryService, WattecoTunSlipManagement

This class is used to connect the Watteco WSN to the ApAM environment. An instance of this class instanciate Watteco sensors with ApAM implementation. This class it is also an OSGi/iPOJO bundle, that provide two services and instanciate itself automatically.

Since:
August 13, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
WattecoIOService, WattecoDiscoveryService, WattecoTunSlipManagement

sendCommand

public byte[] sendCommand(java.lang.String addr,
                          java.lang.String cmd,
                          boolean resp)
Description copied from interface: WattecoIOService
Sends the given command to the sensor corresponding to the given IPv6 address, and retrieves the returned value, if any.

Specified by:
sendCommand in interface WattecoIOService
Parameters:
addr - the IPv6 address of the sensor
cmd - the command to be sent to the sensor
resp - if the border router have to wait for response
Returns:
an array of bytes corresponding to the hexadecimal value returned by the sensor, if any
